reviewText:
Nice to have 3 good family movies on one dvd.
Enjoy the holiday movies all year round.
Well worth the money.
Snow DVD is so nice to watch with no commercials . Picture is very clear. So nice to have three Christmas in one DVD.

This was a Christmas present for my Mom, she loves to watch Christmas movies. I haven't watched any of the movies that I've bought off Amazon yet, but she hasn't complained about the quality of them yet so all is good in the world!
Enjoyed all three movies, especially Christmas in handcuffs.  It arrived in a timely manner & in good shape.  Would recommend.

Holiday in Handcuffs I just love! I find it really comical and has the 'awww' factor in the end. As for the Snow movies, the first one was just ok. Honestly, the 2nd one I couldn't make it thru it! It didn't keep my attention and I tried!
This is a great family triple play for your Christmas collection.
Would not play in our blue ray player, Had to return.
Cute
Great results, daughter lives overseas and was happy she received package.
Love it
Loved it
I love all three of he movies
Far out!

Delivered on Time.
Was what I was told and wanted.  Good TV Movies !!!!
Packging was very good.
Thankyou
I love all of these movies.  I watch them every Christmas so I thought I might as well own them so I don't have to wait for them to be on tv.
great
Great movies. At a great buy three for the price of one love them all!
Good movies.  Exactly what I wanted.  The condition, price, packaging and shipping were perfect.  I couldn't ask for more.
I love this pack of 3 Christmas movies. Great for my collection.
added to my collection... love all 3
My girlfriend likes this movie and she saw this on abc family channel.thats why i bout it for her since tha show it less on abc family channel.
great DVD just as pictured.
I love all three of these movies to put you in the Christmas spirit.  They are very fun and entertaining!
Thank you!
I love Christmas movies. These three movies are some of my favorites. Great for family viewing, especially children.
Cute fluff movies. No academy awards on the horizon, these are fun movies with likable characters.
Part of our Christmas traditions
watched Snow and Snow 2, really enjoyed. Haven't watched the other yet
Product is great but I paid $14.71 on sale and when the DVD arrived i opened it and it had a Kmart sticker on it for  $5.00.  Someone is making a good profit off these movies.
I love Snow and Snow 2. Already had Holiday in Handcuffs, but was a great prince. We are actually watching Holiday in Handcuffs right now. Great movie.
Be careful! We received 3 completely different films. Very disappointed as we like the Snow movies.

I was really excited to get these movies unfortunately I received the wrong Holiday Triple Feature. Instead I received Santa Baby 2, Christmas in Boston, and Snowglobe. I was really looking forward to watching Snow today. I guess I'll have to watch something else. I'm annoyed that now I have to go through the process of returning this one and waiting for my refund.
These are cute, fun, romantic Christmas movies. I'd recommend to anyone who can stand cheesy acting, storyline, and moments. I loved them!
Great Christmas movie set ...
Love Christmas movies! These were on Netflix for a couple of years but they were removed for this season. The price was right and now I can watch them anytime : )
Enjoyed all three movies
i forget
Great DVD if you like Christmas Movies
great
I like all Holiday movie.
I discovered the Snow movies on Netflix and bought the DVD in case they go away. I can't think of Christmas without them!
so happy that I found all 3 movies for a price that I'm happy to pay
The Holiday in Handcuffs is ok but didn't care for the Snow and Snow 2 Brain Freeze.

I recently 'cut the cord' when it comes to television and mainly use netflix and hulu thanks to my Roku and Samsung TV (both of which I got from amazon). This is a great little collection of Christmas movies all of which I love. ABC Family creates some fantastic family friendly holiday movies that are for all ages.
great movies
We loved all 3 Christmas Films.  We have watched them numerous times over the Christmas period, and recommend all 3 to add to your collection.
I was very happy to get some of my favorite T.V. Christmas movies, and I plan on getting more. Thank you for the speed of the delivery, I'm very happy.
My dad loves the Snow movies and my mom likes Melissa Joan Hart so this seemed like a perfect gift to give them.
when it got here I tried it in my dvd player and it would not work at all except for a few commercials
Arrived in Perfect condition! Great holiday collection!! I was so excited to see my favorite holiday movie included in this pack!
loved this movie so funny, a great christmas movie for the whole family, had a great story & no nudity like alot thats on tv
I love the movies I have seen them all before  But I was very disappointed to find that one of the movies just does NOT play in ANY  DVR player I did not report this I just use the other two.

The DVD that I ordered, Holiday in Handcuffs / Snow / Snow 2 , was not delivered. Instead I received the DVD Snow 2 only.
So I paid for 3 movies and only received 1. I opened the package before I realized it was not what I ordered.

VERY DISAPPOINTED
Great holiday movies...especially funny is Holiday in Handcuffs,  unfortunately not close captioned so I can't enjoy them!  Why not close caption ??
HOLIDAY IN HANDCUFFS WILL HAVE YOU LAUGHING AND AT TIMES FEELING SAD, BUT THE ENDING WILL MAKE YOU SHOUT WITH JOY. MY FAVORITE HOLIDAY MOVIE. ENJOY
This one is a great bargain.  I enjoy adding to my Christmas movie collection.  It helps me get in the Christmas spirit.
This brings great Christmas fun. I would recommend it to any one who loves the Christmas season. It brings Christmas right into your home.
I bought this for a friend who loves Christmas movies and loves it and will watch them throughout the year.
I've seen all three movies on TV and I enjoyed them.  The Snow  and Snow 2 movies were not on this Christmas season so I was glad to get them.  Will enjoy watching them now.
I LOVE all these movies and enjoy getting into the Christmas spirit around my Christmas tree watching these heart-warming movies :)
What can I say...I love Christmas movies.  I can watch them any time and all year long...they make me feel good.
movie came as described and both movies play like there supposed to family enjoys the movies and watches a lot would buy again if in need of a movie for a good price
Good comedies are hard to find; glad to get a good value and save space with these three in one package.
we enjoyed them all .they are all good moives I would recommend it for anyone and we would watch them again
In a time where good entertainment in the movie industry is hard to find, these three are a refreshing delight.
I like light love or family stories that bring a little tear to your eyes. These three did that for me. Also i'm a fan of both main stars.
well pleased.  I am watching it over and over again. It is so funny I just can't get enough watching it.  So clean it is wonderful.

We caught the movie Snow on ABC Family this Christmas. We couldn't finish watching it so the boys asked if we would try to find it.  Sure enough Amazon had it.  They watched Snow 1 and 2 immediately.  I watched Holiday in Handcuffs.
I love Cheesy Christmas and thees are made for tv movies. Awesome!  They are so fun to watch alone or with your family.  If you share in my Cheesy movie passion you will LOVE them!
That one was awesome.  I have already watched it several times and enjoy it each time.  Mario Lopez just does not get boring and tiresome.  My opinion.
Enjoyed no sex, violence, bad language & fun in these movies.  There is no real reference to why we really have Christmas, but if you want a movie that is safe for family-these work.
my family and I really enjoyed christmas. We enjoyed the movies will be able to enjoy them for years to come.
The movies were great.  I was dissapointed that they were not closed caption or subtitled for the hearing impaired. For that reason I will no longer order any movies by GAIAM

My husband and I watched Holiday in Handcuffs one year on tv, and thought it was funny and cute and the perfect movie to snuggle up on the couch together. We were excited to buy it along with these other two movies, which are also just fun and uplifting. Maybe a little cheesy, but got us in the Christmas spirit.
love all  my Christmas dvd's Melissa joan hart is so funny
Bought this for Holiday in Handcuffs. One of our favorite family holiday movies. I can't really comment on Snow, we haven't watched those yet.
Heartwarming movies for the holidays!

the quality of the films are great. I bought this for Snow I stumbled on it a few years ago and found the chemistry between the leads as well as the acting much better than your standard made for TV movie. Very cute, very family friendly and the second one is equally as good. Now I would have given this a better rating but Holiday in Handcuffs the chemistry was not there the acting was meh and I like Melissa Joan Hart I don't know what was happening here. The storyline is generic and the only likable characters are the siblings who get barely any screen time.
Yes I love it they work good
Great holiday video(s)
Good to see this combo together
It was good and on time one of them Skip  but work after  I clean it
great movies
Love these movies! Snow/Snow 2 are fantastic!
